feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 6:30 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: E 53 km/h gust 66 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow changing to rain or drizzle near midnight then to flurries before morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area this evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
